Daniele,
Sorry, I did not understand you correctly. I thought that you chan=
ged 
thermodynamic properties of some components such as a heat of formatio=
n 
etc. But now I don't understand why do you use the Reactors Network to 
=
simulate heat losses in a piston. You can do it very easy with one 
reactor=
, changing the heat transfer coefficient. Even you can introduce 
an arbitr=
ary time-dependent function for heat losses. 

Best regards, Anatoli
